FuncDef:
The nbns command specifies an NBNS server for the current domain.
The undo nbns command deletes an NBNS server of the current domain.
By default, no NBNS server is configured to any domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of the NBNS server.
It is in dotted decimal format and must be a valid unicast address.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Modifications of the NBNS server specified by the domain take effect during next login.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
